channel.title: Connecting 2 Axo's. ? another noob question
channel.description: If I got a second Axo, is it possible to transfer the signal from one to the other without going DAC - line out (1st axo) - line in (2nd axo) - ADC ? And if it is, would this then mean I have freed up the line out (1st axo) and line in (2nd axo) to use as an additional input / output ?

item.title: Connecting 2 Axo's. ? another noob question
item.dc:creator: @Gavin Gavin
item.description:
@Gavin wrote:

If I got a second Axo, is it possible to transfer the signal from one to the other without going DAC - line out (1st axo) - line in (2nd axo) - ADC ? And if it is, would this then mean I have freed up the line out (1st axo) and line in (2nd axo) to use as an additional input / output ?
